meanings.definition: Not subject to any conditions or limitations.
meanings.sent1: Her love for her children was unconditional, always there no matter what.
meanings.sent2: The shelter provided unconditional support to those in need.
meanings.sent3: The dog's loyalty was unconditional, even when the treats ran out.
meanings.sent4: The artist's passion for painting was unconditional, flowing endlessly onto the canvas.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's dedication to her students was unconditional, unwavering through challenges.
